description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
number of approached locations within the respective condition
relative percentage calculated by the number of approached locations/number of baited locations (eg 10)
number of revisited locations within the respective condition
relative percentage calculated by the number of revisited locations/number of baited locations
